name: Sally 5
description:
for the first time ever sally 5 is downloadable from itch.io. the first time it was downloadable was on Glorious train-wrecks. and it has been playable on my website with a official name.

it was first finished in late 2018. near Halloween if i remember....

Controls are left and right to go left and right

space is shoot

shift is jump

have fun!!!
